element.name: DOOM Eternal: Assault on Armaros Station

description.p: What happens when you mix the latest installment of the most beloved franchise in FPS history with the storytelling possibilities of a tabletop RPG? Pure Argent Energy magic.

Whether you’re here because you were entertained by the slapstick carnage of Critical Role’s DOOM Eternal One-Shot or simply because you’re a die-hard DOOM enthusiast, this action-packed supplement for the world’s oldest roleplaying game is made for you. Within these pages, you’ll find all of the narrative tools you’ll need for a few sessions of your own tabletop escapades featuring humanity’s never-ending battle against the forces of evil.
